text:
Hi everyone! :wave:
Is it possible to setup URL for my website with uppercase letters?
For example <https://www.example.com/SoCW> instead of <https://www.example.com/socw> ?
“An Internet address is only case-sensitive for everything after the domain name”

When creating a CTA button with just the link (for testing purposes) <https://www.HubSpot.com/>

When I click the button it redirects me to the 404 page?


EDIT:

So I found the error but not really a way how to fix it for now.

I have a domain and just the <http://xxxx.hs-sites.com/|xxxx.hs-sites.com/>

and the cta button always gets the domain instead of the <http://hs.site|hs.site> link

Hello everyone,

When we're using chatflows, by default, it shows the replying person's name there directly. But to change that, there's an option "Custom Branding" as well which is great and always lets you reply with aliases as "Support" or "Company Name" all the time.

Now, instead of chatflows, we're using chatbots which kinda have the same behavior as it shows "Hubbot" at start but later when a real person replies, it starts to show an actual name. In the chatbot, I see no option to hide real agent's name. Is there something I'm missing out?

Also, thanks for creating a platform for this helpful community to come together
Hey. Do we have the possibility, maybe via custom code in a workflow, to disconnect an associated contact to a ticket?
Is it possible to edit system page templates in a editor like the normal page editor?
Is it only me or is it not possible to move folders in Workflows and Lists? :slightly_smiling_face:

no, you would need to edit them in the Design Manager. However, what you could potentially do, is: a) Install the Developer Extension and activate "Developer Mode"  b) open a page in the page editor c) design your section d) hover over the section and click on the arrow next the the Section Controls - when you are in Developer Mode this should say "Copy as hubl". Then you get hubl code that you should be able to paste into your system page template

Our team is looking to create a custom webhook through workflows. We have an open source API that we would like to receive information from. For context the data in the API is restaurant related information. Our goal is to set up a custom trigger whereby if a city receives 5 new restaurants then we send subscribers an email that dynamically populates the information regarding those 5 new restaurants.

What is the best way to approach this build? Any thoughts or suggestions are welcome, thank you!

Hi All, I'm new here and hope someone can advise me.

I have a HS Form to get user email and zip code. It redirects to another HS page. When the user doesn't consent to cookies (ignores accept cookie request), the form field values aren't available on the redirected page.
What options do I have to get this data?

Hi HubSpot people,
Can I create a product library without being subscribed to any premium package?
I need to use it for learning and development only
You can make a dev account which lets you make test accounts to try this in
I already have a text sandbox account but that part is still locked
You need to create a test account within the sandbox:
Is there any way to do a HubSpot slide-in call-to-action with a *custom font* (non-Google Font), on an external page?
